com.budjb.requestbuilder
[Groovy] Class RequestBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.budjb.requestbuilder.RequestBuilder

@Deprecated
class RequestBuilder

The RequestBuilder abstracts the underlying code to build a Jersey Client request into a closure.

Authors:
Bud Byrd

Field Detail

accept

public java.lang.String accept
Accept header.

basicAuthPassword

public java.lang.String basicAuthPassword
basic auth password

basicAuthUserName

public java.lang.String basicAuthUserName
basic auth user name

binaryResponse

public java.lang.Boolean binaryResponse
Whether the caller expects a binary return. If true, the returned object will be a byte array. Note that this is a workaround to jersey not providing automatic content conversion based on mime type.

body

public java.lang.Object body
Body of the request - only useful on POST or PUT.

chunkSize

public java.lang.Integer chunkSize
Size (in bytes) to chunk the request.

connectionTimeout

public java.lang.Integer connectionTimeout
The Connection Timeout for the Client.

contentType

public java.lang.String contentType
Content-Type header.

convertJson

public java.lang.Boolean convertJson
Whether to attempt to slurp JSON automatically.

convertXML

public java.lang.Boolean convertXML
Attempt to use xmlslurpler to parse xml.

cookies

public java.util.Map cookies
Cookies to include with the request.

debug

public java.lang.Boolean debug
Whether to log the request and response.

encodeGzip

public java.lang.Boolean encodeGzip
Encode the request with gzip compression.

followRedirects

public java.lang.Boolean followRedirects
Whether to automatically follow redirects.

form

public java.util.Map form
Form parameters Note that if this is set, this is used and body is ignored.

headers

public java.util.Map headers
Headers

ignoreInvalidSSL

public java.lang.Boolean ignoreInvalidSSL
Whether to ignore SSL cert validation.

jerseyRequestBuilder

protected JerseyRequestBuilder jerseyRequestBuilder
Jersey request builder bean.

public java.util.Map query
Query parameters.

rawClientResponse

public java.lang.Boolean rawClientResponse
If true, do not response handling, and return the raw response object.

readTimeout

public java.lang.Integer readTimeout
The Read Timeout for the Client.

skipStatusCheck

public java.lang.Boolean skipStatusCheck
If true, do not check the response status code, and thus don't throw an exception for codes > 2xx.

uri

public java.lang.Object uri
The URI to hit. Can either be a String or an URI.

useBasicAuth

public java.lang.Boolean useBasicAuth
If true uses BasicAuth
